title: Civitai
description:
Civitai is the leading Gen AI Creator Hub, whose mission is to make tools and resources universally accessible.

Offering hosting, image generation, and LoRA training services, Civitai has grown to become a community of 5M monthly active members, bringing together a vibrant collective of artists, developers, and filmmakers focused on growing the creator ecosystem.

Civitai leads the Project Odyssey AI Film Initiative (projectodyssey.ai) and Artist in Residence Program (air.civitai.com).
